long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Do you want to do 100 things but in the end, you do half and bad things? 
Then you are not satisfied at all and with a bitter taste in your mouth you go to bed brooding.

Are you sure you focus on what really matters?

You know, sometimes you just need to do one thing and your day can be considered a success.
Give it a go.

This extension will help you by reminding you that you have to do that precise thing every time you open an empty tab.
